src.tables

Class NATTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.tables.NATTable

  • public class NATTable
extends java.lang.Object
    The NAT Table class stored the NAT table in nat.txt
    Author:
    silval

      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(java.lang.String interfaceType,
                     IPv4Address address)
        Add an entry to the NAT table.
        Parameters:
        interfaceType - The interface to be translated.
        address - The address of the NAT at the specified interface.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String interfaceType)
        Check if an interface contains a NAT.
        Parameters:
        interfaceType - The interface to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if NAT present, false otherwise.

      • getAddress

        public IPv4Address getAddress(java.lang.String interfaceType)
        Get the NAT address for a specified interface.
        Parameters:
        interfaceType - The interface (eth0, eth1, ppp0, etc..)
        Returns:
        The NAT IPv4 address.

      • addTranslation

        public void addTranslation(TranslationTableEntry translationEntry)
        Add a translation to the NAT translation table.
        Parameters:
        translationEntry - The translation table entry to be added.

      • getTranslation

        public TranslationTableEntry getTranslation(IPv4Address address,
                                            int port)
        Get the translation table entry for a destination address and port.
        Parameters:
        address - The translated destination address.
        port - The translated source port.
        Returns:
        The translation table entry.

      • hasBeenTranslated

        public boolean hasBeenTranslated(IPv4PDU pdu)
        Check whether a received pdu has been translated.
        Parameters:
        pdu - The pdu to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if it is in the translation table, false otherwise.

      • alreadyHasSourcePort

        public boolean alreadyHasSourcePort(int sourcePort)
        Check if a source port is already contained in the translation table.
        Parameters:
        sourcePort - The source port to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if present, false otherwise.

      • generateNewSourcePort

        public int generateNewSourcePort(int sourcePort)
        Generate a new source port number.
        Parameters:
        sourcePort - The source port number to be changed.
        Returns:
        The new source port number.
